name: Pancake Clicker
description:
This game was made for the Waffle Jam 2. 

Game made by NotVeryGoodZA

Art by NotVeryGoodZA

Music by David Renda

This game is a simple clicker game in the theme of pancakes.

It has a mix between Vector and Pixel art. 

It also has several achievements. 

Thanks for playing and this is my first Game Jam.
